remarks: Scalar product operation for the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualfvs.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualfvs.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ldualfvs.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualfvs.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
ldualfvs.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
ldualfvs.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualfvs.s $e |- .xb = ( .s ` D ) $.
ldualfvs.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. Y ) $.
ldualfvs.m $e |- .x. = ( k e. K , f e. F |-> ( f oF .X. ( V X. { k } ) ) ) $.
ldualfvs $p |- ( ph -> .xb = .x. ) $.
$d .X. f k $.
$d F f k $.
$d K f k $.
$d V f k $.
$d W f k $.
$d f k $.
$d f k $.
